text: int main ( void ) { long long int t ; scanf ( "%lld" , & t ) ; long long int a [ t ] , i , j , k , count , ans , sum , h = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { count = 0 ; sum = 0 ; h = 0 ; scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; long long int b [ a [ i ] ] ; for ( j = 0 ; j < a [ i ] ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & b [ j ] ) ; } if ( a [ i ] == 1 ) { printf ( "1\n" ) ; } else { for ( j = 0 ; j < a [ i ] ; j ++ ) { count = 0 ; h = 0 ; ans = 0 ; for ( k = j ; k < a [ i ] - 1 ; k ++ ) { if ( b [ k ] <= b [ k + 1 ] ) { count ++ ; ans = count * ( count + 1 ) / 2 ; if ( k == a [ i ] - 2 ) { h = 1 ; } } else { j = k ; break ; } } sum = sum + ans ; if ( h == 1 ) { break ; } } printf ( "%lld\n" , sum + a [ i ] ) ; } } return 0 ; }
